headline: Is Boeing (BA) Priced Fairly After Recent Safety And Production Concerns?
summary: If you are wondering whether Boeing's current share price reflects its true worth, you are not alone. The stock's recent moves have raised fresh questions about value. Boeing shares last closed at US$242.59, with returns of 4.0% over 7 days, 3.4% over 30 days, 6.5% year to date, 34.4% over 1 year, 11.1% over 3 years and 11.7% over 5 years. Recent headlines around Boeing have focused on safety and production quality issues, regulatory scrutiny and the company's efforts to address operational...
